subject: Automobile Racing
Drag Racing
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch ended its sponsorship of the National Hot Rod Association. The St. Louis-based division of Anheuser-Busch InBev also announced that it would end its 30-year relationship with Kenny Bernstein Racing’s N.H.R.A. team. The brewery said the relationship was the longest in motorsports history, eclipsing STP’s 28-year sponsorship of Nascar’s Richard Petty. nhra.
